name: Killer
tagline: Killer is LGPL project of an urban game (mobile app based on geolocalisation)
body:
### Welcome to the Killer project.
![Killer development banner](https://a5427ff4-a-e7660e37-s-sites.googlegroups.com/a/simplisim.net/creation/GoogleCommunityDevelopment.png)

### Background technology
Killer backend is written in C++ whereas the front-end (UI) is written in QML, both supported by the Qt Framework.
The design principle is a distributed Massive Role-Playing Pervasive Game : every players instance of killer communicate to a MySQL database that stores events between the killers instance. 
There is no centralized software in charge of the game logic.
 

### How to start
* download and install Qt Sdk.
  * Android :
    * download Android SDK and NDK, provide Qt creator with the according paths
* fork the killer project on gitHub, build and deploy
